unofficialnetworks.com/2015/04/13-year-o.snippet: A young up and coming French surfer was killed yesterday in a shark attack off of Reunion Island. Elio Canestri, 13, was attacked while surfing with seven others off the French Indian Ocean island of La Reunion.
